subCommands.name: configure
subCommands.description: lets you configure basic things on the system

attributes.name: terminal
attributes.description: switches the cli into the Configure-Terminal-mode

attributes.name: memory
attributes.description: configures the system from NV memory

attributes.name: network
attributes.description: configures the system from TFTP network

subCommands.name: hostname
subCommands.description: sets the networkname of this device

attributes.name: Input Hostname
attributes.description: Input that represents the Networkname of the system
